attributes.action: Call for David Cameron's resignation. The UK does not want anymore migrants.
attributes.background: David Cameron has sat back for months saying no, to opening the UK up to migrants. However now he has started to buckle under political pressure. David Cameron you serve us the UK people, not the political elite of other nations. We are stretched to breaking point, why can't government see this.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a matter for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We could accept a petition simply calling for a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister, because that is something that the House of Commons could do. You may find that there is already a petition about this open on the site.
